<!-- Maybe add some id automatically -->
*************************
#### Create an xts-Object
<!-- Tags: *additional tags for this specific card* -->
**Create an `xts`-Timeseries with the values `1:5` for the past 5 days.**

<!-- start backside --><br>
```{r}
xts1 <- xts::xts(x = 1:5, order.by = Sys.Date() - 0:4)
```
`xts` is used to create an xts object from raw data inputs.
(Footnote: Input taken from Datacamp-Cheatsheet)
<!-- end backside -->

*****************************
#### Generate a Time Sequence
<!-- Tags: *additional tags for this specific card* -->
**Generate a vector of 5 `Date`s, starting on January 1st, 2017.**

<!-- start backside --><br>
```{r}
seq(as.Date("2017-01-01"), length = 5, by = "days")
```
<!-- end backside -->

***********************
#### Access Data and Timeindex of an `xts`-object
<!-- Tags: *additional tags for this specific card* -->

<!-- start backside --><br>
```{r}
zoo::coredata(xts1)
zoo::index(xts1)
```
<!-- end backside -->

#### Round the time-Index of your timeseries
<!-- Tags: *additional tags for this specific card* -->
**Round index to the next n=60 seconds**

<!-- start backside --><br>
```{r}

```
